data.name: Defensive Measures
data.detailed_description:
"Defensive Measures" it's in the name; devise strategies to defend your objective and blast incoming robots before they damage your objective. Be careful though, they can see you, so before they take an aim at you, shoot them or hide in a good spot and make your turrets shoot them........ OR both ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
Its a first person / tower defense hybrid, take your defensive measures to save your objective.

Featuring :


  • 50+ Enemy variants with 4 sub variants
  • 8 Unique levels
  • 6 Unique gun types
  • 6 Unique turret types
  • Blockade modules to block enemy path
  • Hidden secrets to find
  • Airstrikes to decimate enemies

Feedback / Suggestions are welcomed to enhance the game.

Additional content and features coming soon.....

data.short_description: Defensive Measures is an FPS/Tower Defense Hybrid game. Deal with your enemies first hand or let your turrets do the talking while you sit back and enjoy the show.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 Bit - Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-3220 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA: GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720P Low
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 Bit - Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1200 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
